mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estate of Hugh Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a statement issued by McNutt (of Gilkeson & McNutt) listing charges for sundries (food, clothing, fabric, sewing notions, etc.) throughout 1858, 1859, and 1860. On the front the name is listed as Adams Andy. On the reverse is a statement, signed with his mark by Andy Miles, directing the charges, which totaled $57.19, should be paid out of money due to him from his late master, Hugh Adams. The statement was read to Andy Miles and attested by A. Patterson.
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Invoice from McNutt for Andy, 1858-1860
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
